description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the issue of insufficient recovery partition sizes on several thousand computers using Intune:

1. Utilize MHimken's Patch-WinRE script to manage recovery partition size adjustments.
2. Integrate with Intune to ensure graceful restarts and detection through the application model.

**Details**:
This method has proven effective in managing recovery partition sizes across a large fleet of devices while ensuring minimal disruption to users. By leveraging PowerShell and Intune's capabilities, system administrators can automate and streamline the process. (LLM Synthesized)
